item.title: Word Power Made Easy
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Mind Maps How to Talk About Personality How to Talk About Doctors How to Talk About Practitioners How to Talk About Science How to Talk About Liar How to Talk About Actions How to Talk About Speech Habits How to Insult Your Enemies How to Flatter Your Friends How to Talk About Common Phenomena and Occurrences How to Talk About What’s Goes on Foo Introduction This is a note for a book named Word Power Made Easy.
